chapter.title: Requirements for version 1.0
chapter.para: The first major version of the application is intended to be a simple tool for recording, editing and mixing of audio data.

The eventual goal is to create an application that is similar in functionality to Steinberg's Cubase. The design and usability of the application will also be modelled on Cubase as it is a popular tool and the design has been refined over many versions. Once the application is complete enough to be useful then differenciation may occur.
